link.title: COVID-19 (Coronavirus) Resources | Campbell Union School District

button.class: navbar-toggle pull-left btn search btn-default btn-cusd-text

div.strong: All schools are closed through June 11th, 2020.

div.p: For the health and safety of our students during the COVID-19 school closure, we provide academic and wellness resources.

div.h3: April 17 Briefing: 1st Distance Learning Week Complete Updated Fri, Apr 17th 2020 3:21 pm

p.span: A message from Superintendent Viramontez during the COVID19 Shelter in Place

div.h3: Protections fortified for online learning Updated Wed, Apr 15th 2020 4:57 pm
Overcoming Language Barriers During Distance Learning Updated Wed, Apr 15th 2020 1:27 pm
April 8 COVID19 Superintendent's Update Updated Wed, Apr 8th 2020 6:10 pm

p.span: As Spring Break ends, district moves into new phase of distance learning.

div.h3: District services pause during scheduled Spring Break Updated Mon, Apr 6th 2020 1:29 pm

p.span: Meals still available thanks to community partners. See updates on our COVID-19 page.

div.h3: April 3 Update from the Superintendent Updated Fri, Apr 3rd 2020 2:28 pm

p.span: Video message about extended school closure from Dr. Viramontez

div.h3: Schools Closed Remainder of the Year Updated Thu, Apr 2nd 2020 1:31 pm
School Closures Extended Updated Wed, Apr 1st 2020 5:00 pm

p.span: UPDATE FOR MARCH 25-APRIL 3: Keeping you informed during the COVID-19 shelter-in-place.

div.h3: Protect Student Privacy: Think Before You Post Updated Wed, Apr 1st 2020 9:38 pm

p.span: It's fun to share. Please use care.

div.h3: Student Meals During Spring Break and Beyond Updated Thu, Apr 2nd 2020 11:59 am

p.span: Updated schedule: Grab and go meals available Monday through Friday.

div.h3: Update on CUSD School Closures Updated Wed, Apr 1st 2020 9:38 pm

p.span: Update 3/24/2020: A Message from the Superintendent

div.h3: School Closure: Help for At-Home Learning Updated Wed, Apr 1st 2020 9:38 pm

p.span: To help families adjust to at-home learning, we have compiled a few activities for students.

div.h3: Update on COVID-19 Updated Wed, Apr 1st 2020 3:24 pm
March 11: Update on COVID-19 Updated Wed, Apr 1st 2020 3:24 pm
Coronavirus Update - Feb. 28- March 3 Updated Wed, Apr 1st 2020 3:24 pm

p.span: Precautions recommended though risk remains low.

div.h3: Health Update: Coronavirus Precautions Updated Wed, Apr 1st 2020 3:25 pm

p.span: Health Department advises common sense precautions. Special guidelines for specific cases.

div.p: Please check your your school's web page for school-level resources. new
